message.name: ERR_SLOTALLOCATION_FV_USER_DAILY_SCHEDULE_START_TIME_INVALID
message.locale: Invalid format of user daily schedule start time environment variable.

message.name: ERR_SLOTALLOCATION_FV_USER_DAILY_SCHEDULE_END_TIME_INVALID
message.locale: Invalid format of user daily schedule end time environment variable.

message.name: ERR_SLOTALLOCATION_FV_DEFAULT_SCHEDULING_WORK_ITEM_DURATION_INVALID
message.locale: Invalid format of default scheduling work item duration environment variable.

message.name: ERR_SLOTALLOCATION_XRV_NO_ACTIVE_ORGANIZATION_STRUCTURE
message.locale: Availability could not be determined because no active organization structure exists for the organization.
Availability could not be determined because no active organisation structure exists for the organisation.

message.name: ERR_SLOTALLOCATION_FV_LOCATION_SCHEDULE_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: Daily Schedule Type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SLOTALLOCATION_XFV_NO_OF_DAYS_NO_OF_SLOTS_EMPTY
message.locale: Either the number of available slots to be returned or the number of days over which the slots are to be returned must be entered.

message.name: ERR_SLOTALLOCATION_XRV_SLOT_INACTIVE
message.locale: The Slot is not available as it is canceled.
The Slot is not available as it is cancelled.

message.name: ERR_SLOTALLOCATION_XRV_MAX_WORKUNITS_EXCEEDED
message.locale: The Slot is not available as maximum work units have been exceeded.
